name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Application Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in security automation and vulnerability assessment utilizing tools like **Burp Suite**, **OWASP**, **SAST**, **DAST**, and **SonarQube**. My technical expertise encompasses implementing CI/CD pipelines with **Jenkins** and **GitLab CI**, as well as infrastructure automation using **Terraform** and **Helm**. I have a proven track record in developing secure applications aligned with compliance standards and conducting thorough security assessments to identify and address vulnerabilities. 
Additionally, I leverage my full-stack development capabilities in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, combined with cloud proficiency in **Azure** and **AWS**. My strength in microservices architecture not only enhances system performance but also supports real-time data processing and integration of AI/ML capabilities. I am passionate about delivering robust, high-performance solutions while maintaining a focus on security best practices.
